description: A children's book parody for tired parents. Originally published in 2011.
title: GO THE -- TO SLEEP
author: Adam Mansbach

description: Advice for parents-to-be. Originally published in 1984.
title: WHAT TO EXPECT WHEN YOU'RE EXPECTING
author: Heidi Murkoff and Sharon Mazel

description: After her husband confesses to multiple infidelities, a woman who has overcome bulimia and alcoholism struggles to grow — and so does he.
title: LOVE WARRIOR
author: Glennon Doyle Melton

description: The sportscaster describes what it was like to forge his own career in the shadow of his beloved broadcasting father (who was also his best friend), Jack Buck.
title: LUCKY BASTARD
author: Joe Buck

description: Dad Darth tries to coax young Luke and Leia to sleep with a bedtime story.
title: GOODNIGHT DARTH VADER
author: Jeffrey Brown

description: A family guide to caring for people who have Alzheimer's disease, related dementias and memory loss.
title: THE 36-HOUR DAY
author: Nancy L Mace and Peter V Rabins

description: In this comic reimagining, the Dark Lord of the Sith is just like any other dad.
title: DARTH VADER AND SON
author: Jeffrey Brown

description: Overwhelmed by her father’s death, a British woman decides to raise a goshawk, a bird that is fierce and notoriously difficult to tame.
title: H IS FOR HAWK
author: Helen Macdonald

description: Essays about life with an over-involved parent, based on the Instagram account @CrazyJewishMom.
title: MOTHER, CAN YOU NOT?
author: Kate Siegel

description: Interviews with more than 70 teenagers shed light on their experience of sexuality.
title: GIRLS AND SEX
author: Peggy Orenstein
